string-array.name: pizza_titles
string-array.item: Neapolitan pizza
Detroit pizza
St. Louis pizza
Neapolitan pizza
Detroit pizza
St. Louis pizza
Neapolitan pizza
Detroit pizza
St. Louis pizza

string-array.name: pizza_descriptions
string-array.item: The typical Neapolitan pizza toppings are fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil leaves, oregano, and olive oil. Since Neapolitan pizza is thin, it isn\'t designed to handle the weight of too many toppings
Detroit pizza traditionally features pepperoni, brick cheese (usually Wisconsin brick cheese), and tomato sauce. Other typical toppings include mushrooms and olives
St. Louis pizza features Provel cheese and a sweeter tomato sauce with a hefty dosage of oregano. Because of its firm crust, St. Louis-style pizza can support several toppings of your choice

string-array.item: Mai-tai
Martini
Mojito
Mai-tai
Martini
Mojito

Martini
Mojito

string-array.name: cocktails_descriptions
string-array.item: The Mai Tai is a cocktail based on rum, Curaçao liqueur, orgeat syrup, and lime juice, associated with Polynesian-style settings
Classic Gin Martini Cocktail. The archetypal gin serve, the Gin MARTINI Cocktail was an icon of the 20th century, and is more popular than ever in the 21st
The mojito is one of the most famous rum-based highballs. There are several versions of the mojito

string-array.name: pasta_descriptions
string-array.item: For a quick dinner, whip up Tyler Florence\'s authentic Spaghetti alla Carbonara recipe, a rich tangle of pasta, pancetta and egg, from Food Network
Garlicky Mushroom + Kale with Pasta. This recipe is very flexible and can be mixed up using different broths, noodles or herbs
Like this creamy cajun linguine. It’s not only easy to make, but creamy, simple pastas exhibit a simple elegance to me

string-array.name: stores_descriptions
string-array.item: Catchy restaurants is located on the east of the catchy mountains where fresh st. Martha pepper and other bolivian spices are grown
Goerreshof of origin deep Germany has all the fresh city grown flavours your life is missing
Santa barbara is located just near the barbara so your stuff gets picked up chap chap and you get it within no minutes
